description: Every once in a while, you stumble upon a winning recipe that is both healthy (no refined sugar, dairy-free, gluten-free, high-protein) and delicious.  This one happens to be super versatile as well.  I put this crumble topping on muffins that are in need of some wow factor, on cakes that I want to add texture to, and of course on top of fruit for crumbles.
title: High Protein Almond Flax Crumble Topping
